snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 1,893 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
abstract: Defense Department confirms the death of an American service member as part of the Afghan war and related operations.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 1,893 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
